EmailTemplate.subject: How Can We Help? Tell Us More About Your Sensing and Navigation Needs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Our inertial sensors and navigation team is here to help. Whether you’re waiting for a project to start, or it’s just not the right time, let us know. We’d love to learn more about your navigation needs.
To learn more and to speak with an inertial sensor and navigation product specialist, please contact us today.
CONTACT US <https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/tbyb-program?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_imu_gh>
